'''''The Shimmering Voyage Vol. 3''''' is the Version 3.0 Commemorative [[soundtrack]] album.

It features over 60 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. The album is divided into three discs: ''La liesse, ou le fluide mirage des songes'', ''Tathya-Samvrti'', and ''Anecdotes of Reverie''.

The album was first announced on June 23, 2023, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 3.8]]. The tracklist was announced on July 24, and the album was later released on July 26.<ref>Weibo: [https://weibo.com/6593199887/4926998734178554 {{zh|「《原神》3.0回顾主题OST即将上线 」}}]</ref>
